      • dfrprmn

        public double dfrprmn(PdVector p,
             double fTol,
             PnFunction func)
        Perform several energy minimization steps using a conjugate gradient method. The set of variables and the energy are given as parameters.

        Maximal number of steps is bounded by getMaxNumIterations which can be adjusted before calling this methods.

        If more iterations than getMaxNumIterations are needed until the stop criteria is reached then the method stops and returns with a warning. In this case the resulting vector does not represent a minima but the current state of the minimization process, and therefore can be used as initial value for another call of this method.

        Parameters:
        p - vector with variable data, will be changed.
        fTol - relative difference of energy used as stop criteria
        func - function to be minimized
        Returns:
        function value at minimum
        See Also:
        setMaxNumIterations(int)
